name: Tower Box
description:
Introduction

This is my first videogame developed with Unity3D. It 's a simple game to start but combines in a proper way strategy and emotion, both in pack.

Goal

The aim of the game is to stack as many boxes as possible in order to reach a high score, taking advantage of all the free space you have and taking into account that the gravity force acts against you.

Tools

In order to develop this game, the software tools used are the following ones:

  • Unity Hub 2.4.2.
  • Unity 3D (version 2019.4.17f1.
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2019.
  • Asset Store of Unity (sprites, animations, sounds and backgrounds).
Source code

In the following link you can have a look to the source code of the project.

https://github.com/ZgzInfinity/TowerBox
